title: New Veigar Skin Idea!
body: I think a Minion Master Veigar will be nice! We like so much the minions for the gold and because they are in the league since the start! But what about them? Maybe a Veigar with a skin who seems like a minion will change them life! {{champion:45}}

replies.body: dude u gotta be kidding me, he has tons of skins, almost in all prices. (not one in 1.3kRp). why he will need more than that, is the same that asking for a skin for {{champion:13}}

Veigar has a million skins already. but I still like the idea.  
Still waiting for a new zed skin.
